heading: london blast kills 2
subheading: a nail bomb that exploded in a crowded gay pub in the soho district of london friday, killing two and injuring scores, may have been planted by right-wing extremists, police say. it was the third such attack in two weeks, and white supremecists have claimed responsibility for the other two -- one aimed at blacks and the other at bangladeshis. the bomb exploded shortly after 6:30 p.m. local time at the admiral duncan pub, causing what one witness described as "absolute carnage." two patrons were confirmed killed in the blast and as many as 40 were injured, reuters reported.
author: wired staff
text: a nail bomb that exploded in a crowded gay pub in the soho district of london friday, killing two and injuring scores, may have been planted by right-wing extremists, police say. it was the third such attack in two weeks, and white supremecists have claimed responsibility for the other two -- one aimed at blacks and the other at bangladeshis. the bomb exploded shortly after 6:30 p.m. local time at the admiral duncan pub, causing what one witness described as "absolute carnage." two patrons were confirmed killed in the blast and as many as 40 were injured, reuters reported.
